SELECT r.id, r.reward_punish_correlation_id, r.member_id, r.operator_id, r.house_id, r.type, r.state, r.remarks, r.create_date, r.modify_date, r.data_status, CONCAT(h.residential,h.building,'栋',h.unit,'单元',h.number,'号') house_name, u.nick_name memberName, t.id tid, t.`name` tname, t.content tcontent, t.type ttype, t.state tstate, m.`id` mid, m.`reward_punish_correlation_id` mreward_punish_correlation_id, m.`name` mname, m.type mtype, m.quantity mquantity, m.units munits, m.start_time mstart_time, m.end_time mend_time FROM `dj_worker_reward_punish_record` r LEFT JOIN dj_house h ON r.house_id = h.id INNER JOIN dj_member u ON r.member_id = u.id INNER JOIN dj_worker_reward_punish_correlation t ON r.reward_punish_correlation_id = t.id INNER JOIN dj_worker_reward_punish_condition m ON r.reward_punish_correlation_id = m.reward_punish_correlation_id where r.data_status=0
and r.id = #{rewardPunishRecordId}
